DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Intraoperative Complication Other Anatomic Site Present Adverse Event Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to specify the anatomic site of the unfavorable and unintended sign or symptom that involves the one or more locations within the body affecting a patient during surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Intraoperative Complication Other Anatomic Site Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to any unfavorable and unintended sign or symptom that involves the one or more locations within the body affecting a patient during surgery.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, syndrome, or disease, temporally associated with the use of a medical product or procedure, regardless of whether or not it is considered related to the product or procedure (attribution of unrelated, unlikely, possible, probable, or definite). The concept refers to events that could be medical product related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another therapy or procedure, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation. The term also is referred to as an adverse experience. The old term Side Effect is retired and should not be used.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Property.preferredName: Intraoperative Complication Other Anatomic Site Present
Property.preferredDefinition: Complications that affect patients during surgery. They may or may not be associated with the disease for which the surgery is done, or within the same surgical procedure.:Not otherwise specified.:Named locations of, or within, the body.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A disease or disorder that occurs during the course of a surgical procedure.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Named locations of or within the body.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical

any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
